name: Links Park
about: LinksPark - All Your Links. In one, Link. Unleash the power of a platform that not only consolidates your links but also provides insightful analytics.

name: Crowdo
about: Crowdo - Your Universal Crowdfunding Platform, Empowering users with seamless crowdfunding experiences.

name: Anonyy
about: Anonymously Send Messages to People. Send and receive messages anonymously

name: Belle Full
about: A Meal Application featuring a landing page, meals page and a page to view saved meals. A user can search for a meal, see the details pertaining to the meal, save the meal and also view all saved meals for later use.

name: Countries Rest API
about: List of Countries of the world from the Countries REST API, Featuring individual Pages for each Country showcasing the basic facts about each country. I had great fun building this and optimising it to be BLAZINGLY FAST for the amount of data being fetched and displayed.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
about: A Rock Paper Scissors Game built with React. Featuring A powerful AI designed to be efficient and unpredictable. Select your choice between Rock, Paper or Scissors and battle the AI immersing yourself in beautiful transitions and animations.

name: Crappo CryptoCurrency App
about: Crappo CryptoCurrency App Landing page, The best crypto currency exchange available with the best imaginary service there is!. I had a lot of fun building this as i used it to learn nextjs.

name: Space Tourism
about: Explore space with this website, made for space enthusiasts. Join your crew and see the technologies you'll travel with and to the destinations available. Interactive and filled with Animations.

name: Card Details Form
about: A little webpage featuring form validation and visualisations and logic on how frontend form / card validations should be done. You Can share your opinions by Forking Contributing to this awesome project.

name: Bookmark landing Page
about: Bookmark landing Page. Bookmark provides bookmarking Services for you across three browsers: Chrome, Firefox and Opera.

name: Url Shortener
about: Shortly, A URL shortener. Its a landing page as well as a service, just copy and paste your Links and it shortens it for you keeping all meta-data. you can copy the link and never lose it as its saved to your browser.
